9.  As a criticism of pro-choice activists, Ronald Reagan said, “I’ve noticed
that everybody who is for abortion has already been born.”
10.  Attacking male opponents of abortion, a feminist claims, “Most
opponents of abortion are men.”
11.  When a member of a fraternity argued for co-ed houses in place of frater-
nities, a critic responded, “When he quits his fraternity in protest and
joins a co-ed house, then he will earn the right to criticize us.”
12.  When Fred argues at a frat
